title: I’m Worried About This, And You Should Be Too (Ep 1770)
description:
Are they preparing to censor and investigate you? The democrats aren’t hiding it anymore. Also in this episode, I address the huge ramifications of today’s elections, and some troubling news about the vaccine. 

News Picks:


Elon drops a bomb on the Twitter deal.

Are conservatives taking back the board room.

While you’re struggling to pay the bills, Biden wants bike lanes. 

Former border chief has a warning about Biden’s illegal immigration plan.


In 1 Chart, How Much the Rich Pay in Taxes.


Biden’s student loan fiasco is not legal.

Fauci says he won't stay if Trump wins 2024 election.
